description:
We are running this event for Porto Freelance community to come and grab a few beers, meet each other and network in a nice atmosphere overlooking Santa Catarina street :)

This edition we'll have as a theme "Future of Remote Work & How to Monetise While Roaming The World". A special event with two special guests: Epi Ludvik and Dren Luci. Epi Ludvik is the Founder & CEO of Crowdsourcing Week, a global platform that is uniting thought leadership on the crowd economy. One of his latest ventures, GoGoPlaces (www.gogoplaces.co), is just an example of the level of passion and commitment to make a positive impact in the world.
Dren is one of the co-founders of GoGoPlaces, where he merges his passion for travel and experiencing new places, with his near obsession for streamlining and maximizing the use of all built environments.

Join us on this fruitful talk, where you can talk about your personal experience and learn wih the best, some tips to monetise while you are abroad.
It has an inclusive, crowdsourced and decentralized format so anyone can participate. More speakers will be announced soon.

We would be very happy if you could contribute with something to our donation box! :)
name: Porto Freelancers Meetup -  The future of remote work
